channel.title: RSAT News
channel.description: Regulatory Sequence Analysis Tools - News and Updates

item.title: RSS feed has moved
item.description: All news and questions are now posted to the forum, for which a RSS feed is available. The current RSS feed is discontinuted. To keep up to date with RSAT, please subscribe to our new RSS feed, on the forum page. The current RSS feed is discontinuted.

item.title: A forum for RSAT
item.description: A forum is available to discuss RSAT programs, report bugs and get in contact with the developers. The Forum is accessible in the Menu "Help>Forum".

item.title: utr option in retrieve-ensembl-seq
item.description: The program retrieve-ensembl-seq now allows to retrieve the sequence of the UTR of your choice or both.

item.title: Logo options in convert-matrix
item.description: The program convert-matrix allows to generate a logo from a given matrix (using the program seqlogo from WebLogo http://weblogo.berkeley.edu). It is now possible to specify additional options for creating logos (error bars, small sample correction, stretching of the logo).

item.title: Retrieve-ensembl-seq able to access latest EnsEMBL version
item.description: The RSAT program retrieve-ensembl-seq is now able to connect to the latest version of EnsEMBL.

item.title: Four articles on RSAT and NeAT in Nature protocols
item.description: Four articles explaining how to use RSAT and NeAT has been published in Nature Protocols

item.title: dna-pattern: new option
item.description: We have added the option non ACGT characters to return positions of the sequence that do not contain ACGT characters (eg: N).

item.title: RSAT Web Services working with .NET clients
item.description: We have updated our server to accomodate .NET clients.
